Project Name: Minasian (Caro) Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts
Title: Majmūʿah
Description.tableOfContents:
Title: Tarjumah-ʾi Tawḥīd-i mufaḍḍal; The name Muḥammad Bāqir appears on folio 131.

Title: Vaṣīyat'namah-ʾi Luqmān; Dānish'pazhūh believes the author is Muḥammad Bāqir ibn Muḥammad Taqī Majlisī. Folios 131-153.

Title: Ikhtiyārāt; Interpretation of the dates of Islamic holidays and birthdates of Qurānic fiqures. Eg. In folio 159 author states that day 23, Joseph's Birthday, is a good day for business, obtaining a wife, approaching a king or sultan [with a request] etc. {see also folios 154-164}.

Title: ʿIlm-i firāsat; According to Dānis'pazhūh, the author is Muḥammad Bāqir ibn Muḥammad Taqī Majlisī. Folios 164-175.

Title: Kunūz al-rumūz; Author is unknown. Folios 175-8.
